targets.query:
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => 
      r["_measurement"] == "ue_info" and 
      r["testbed"] == "default" and
      r["_field"] == "dl_brate" and
      ( (r["pci"] == "${PCI}") or (contains(value: r.pci, set: ${PCI:json})) )
    )
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with ue_id: r["pci"]+"."+r["rnti"]}))
  |> window(every: ${AggregationTime})
  |> group(columns: ["_stop"])
  |> unique(column: "ue_id")
  |> count(column: "ue_id")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r["ue_id"] }))
  |> keep(columns: ["_value"])

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => 
    r["_measurement"] == "ue_info" and 
    r["testbed"] == "default" and
    r["_field"] == "dl_brate"
  )
  |> drop(columns: ["rnti"])
  |> drop(columns: ["pci"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${AggregationTime}, fn: sum)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      r with 
      _value: float(v: r._value) / (float(v: int(v: duration(v: "${AggregationTime}"))) / 1000000000.0)
  }))

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => 
    r["_measurement"] == "ue_info" and 
    r["testbed"] == "default" and
    r["_field"] == "dl_brate"
  )
  |> drop(columns: ["rnti"])

  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${AggregationTime}, fn: sum)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      r with 
      _value: float(v: r._value) / (float(v: int(v: duration(v: "${AggregationTime}"))) / 1000000000.0)
  }))

  |> drop(columns: ["rnti"])

  |> map(fn: (r) => ({

  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)

  |> map(fn: (r) => ({

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => 
    r["_measurement"] == "ue_info" and 
    r["testbed"] == "default" and
    r["_field"] == "dl_brate"
  )
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${AggregationTime}, fn: mean)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => 
    contains(value: r.rnti, set: ${RNTI:json}) and
    contains(value: r.pci, set: ${PCI:json})
  )

data_nok = from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => 
    r["_measurement"] == "ue_info" and 
    r["testbed"] == "default" and
    r["_field"] == "dl_nof_nok"
  )
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${AggregationTime}, fn: sum)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "pci", "rnti", "_value"])

data_ok = from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => 
    r["_measurement"] == "ue_info" and 
    r["testbed"] == "default" and
    r["_field"] == "dl_nof_ok"
  )
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${AggregationTime}, fn: sum)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "pci", "rnti", "_value"])


join(
  tables: {nok: data_nok, ok: data_ok},
  on: ["_time", "pci", "rnti"]
)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => 
    contains(value: r.rnti, set: ${RNTI:json}) and
    contains(value: r.pci, set: ${PCI:json})
  )
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with ratio: float(v: r._value_nok) / (float(v: r._value_ok) + float(v: r._value_nok)) }))
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "ratio", "pci", "rnti"])

data_nok = from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => 
    r["_measurement"] == "ue_info" and 
    r["testbed"] == "default" and
    r["_field"] == "ul_nof_nok"
  )
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${AggregationTime}, fn: sum)

list.definition:
from(bucket: "default")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop) 
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "ue_info") 
  |> keep(columns: ["pci"]) 
  |> distinct(column: "pci")
  |> sort(columns: ["pci"], desc: false)
list.name: PCI
